metadata.description: Welcome back to New York City, years after a world-changing zombie plague. Now, outside forces are knocking on Manhattan's walls! What's worse, the roaming flesh-eaters seem to be growing smarter every day, the ruling blood-suckers struggle to keep their grip on power, and the Southern army is bent on pillaging the greatest city in the world.
metadata.name: George Romero's Empire of the Dead: Act Two
